sentences.en: A family of mice had made their nest in the roof.
sentences.cn: 一窝老鼠在屋顶上安了家。

sentences.en: a flirt making with the eyes.
sentences.cn: 用眼睛调情

sentences.en: always making with the jokes.
sentences.cn: 总是谈笑风声

sentences.en: because your dad's a manager, he's got it made.
sentences.cn: 因为你爸爸是经理，他肯定能成功。

sentences.en: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.
sentences.cn: 人生就应该是快乐的，要抓住每一天，孩子们，让你们的生活变得非凡起来。

sentences.en: could not make out what she was saying.
sentences.cn: 不能理解她在说些什么

sentences.en: Distantly, to her right, she could make out the town of Chiffa.
sentences.cn: 在她右边，远远的，她依稀能辨认出希法镇。

sentences.en: Does this dress make my legs look too stumpy?
sentences.cn: 这条裙子会使我的腿看上去又短又粗吗？

sentences.en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentences.cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

sentences.en: He made out that he was innocent.
sentences.cn: 他试图证明自己是无辜的

sentences.en: He was confident the allies would make good on their pledges.
sentences.cn: 他相信盟友们会履行他们的承诺。

sentences.en: I could barely make out the traffic signs through the rain.
sentences.cn: 在雨中我几乎看不清交通标志

sentences.en: I was made to wait four hours before I was examined by a doctor.
sentences.cn: 我被迫等了四个小时才有一个医生给我做检查。

sentences.en: I'll make the tea and you pop off for a while.
sentences.cn: 我来备茶，你去歇一会儿吧。

sentences.en: I’m going to show you how to make a box for your tools.
sentences.cn: 我来教你怎么做一个箱子存放工具。

sentences.en: It's enough to make you wet yourself, if you'll pardon the expression.
sentences.cn: 这足以吓得你尿裤子了，请原谅我这么说。

sentences.en: kissed and made up.
sentences.cn: 亲吻和好

sentences.en: Leather jeans that are too big will make you look larger.
sentences.cn: 过于肥大的皮裤会让你看起来块头更大。

sentences.en: made out the invoices.
sentences.cn: 开具发票

sentences.en: made out well in business.
sentences.cn: 在生意上进展顺利

sentences.en: made over the property to her son.
sentences.cn: 把财产转到她儿子名下

sentences.en: made up an excuse.
sentences.cn: 编造借口

sentences.en: made up the difference in the bill.
sentences.cn: 弥补了帐单上的差额

sentences.en: made up the front page.
sentences.cn: 为封面排版

sentences.en: made up to his friend's boss.
sentences.cn: 向他朋友的老板献殷勤

sentences.en: Make a list of all the things you need.
sentences.cn: 把你需要的所有物品列一份清单。

sentences.en: make up a prescription.
sentences.cn: 开一个药方

sentences.en: make up a room.
sentences.cn: 把房间收拾好

sentences.en: make up the lost time.
sentences.cn: 补足失去的时间

sentences.en: makes for better communication.
sentences.cn: 促进更好的交流

sentences.en: One hundred years make up a century.
sentences.cn: 一百年构成一个世纪

sentences.en: Richard Chamberlain has agreed to make a sequel to "The Thorn Birds".
sentences.cn: 理查德·张伯伦已经同意接拍《荆棘鸟》的续集。

sentences.en: She made her own wedding dress.
sentences.cn: 她的婚纱是自己做的。

sentences.en: small details that make for comfort.
sentences.cn: 令人舒适的小节

sentences.en: Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
sentences.cn: 有时候要到达谷底，才会慢慢变好。

sentences.en: tell the whole group to make like a bird by putting their arms out.
sentences.cn: 告诉所有组员张开双臂装作鸟。

sentences.en: The company has been making quality furniture for over 200 years.
sentences.cn: 这家公司制作优质家具有两百多年的历史了。

sentences.en: These feelings are likely to make people attempt to overthrow the system.
sentences.cn: 这些情绪有可能促使人们想要推翻现行的体制。

sentences.en: These large institutions make — and change—the rules to suit themselves.
sentences.cn: 这些大机构总是随意制定规定，而且说变就变。

sentences.en: They make compost out of all kinds of waste.
sentences.cn: 他们用各种废料制造堆肥。

sentences.en: They met while they were making a film.
sentences.cn: 他们是在拍电影时认识的。

sentences.en: We're a bit low on bed linen. You'll have to make do.
sentences.cn: 我们的床单有些次，您将就着用吧。

sentences.en: we're made up about the baby.
sentences.cn: 我们因为孩子感到非常高兴。

sentences.en: What make is your car?
sentences.cn: 你的车是什么牌子的？

sentences.en: Why not retrain for a job which will make you happier?
sentences.cn: 为什么不接受新的培训，找一份让你更快乐的工作？

sentences.en: You make me out to be a liar.
sentences.cn: 你暗示我不要说谎

words.tran_cn: 制造者；造物主；出期票人
做，使，安排（make的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: (北英格兰，非正式)很高兴，很愉快
（尤指愉快地）干（或玩）一整天（或一整夜）
(英)（下议院中）获得达到法定人数的议员到场
求活；创造人生；有意义的活
转让：改变或者转移所有权，通常是通过法律文件的方式
使某人的一天过得难忘（或愉快）；使某人的一天生色

trans.tran_en: the name of a particular product or of the company that makes it

trans.tran_cn: 制造，制订，铺床，造成，使变得，引发，做出，迫使，表现，选举，适合，合计，算出，挣钱，到达，使成功，得分
trans.tran_en: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together

trans.tran_cn: 做， 制造， 建造； 制定， 产生； 使， 使得， 迫使； 获得， 挣得； 总计， 等于； 成为； 到达； 准备， 整理； 认为， 估计
trans.tran_en: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together
